title: If this new Wolf/Lamb champion is indeed Ionian...
body: Expect it to be broken af, most if not all Ionian champions are broken on release.

replies.body: ow plz 90% of champs are op on release riot gives them bs stats so you buy them
its easier to release champions that are broken then tone them down than it is to release them as complete and utter garbage then disastrously overtune them.
have you not herd of the pbe ekko was a op dick on pbe they could of toned him down on there he was only on pbe for 2 weeks
they might not be broken, but goddamn are they going to be cancer.
Already confirmed that this is not the case. Refer to the DhaMa concept page for details on the hype-train-wreck.

Wish they'd make Gnarlaf Dude.

Runs through the enemy team and can't be CC'd then throws them all at a wall and proceeds to throw boulders and Axes.
That new champion could be from shadow isle
